house_listing.house_description: This 2 level attached home built in 1977 has 3 bedroom(s), 2.5 bath(s) , 1 car garage and approximately 1547 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, living room, master bedroom. Features include private spa, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker Assoc Realty Coldwell Banker Assoc Realty

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
